title: Create computer repair and sales service application

requirements.text: Create a service listing page displaying available computer repair services with descriptions and pricing
acceptanceCriteria: Display at least 3-5 common repair services (e.g., hardware repair, software troubleshooting, virus removal, data recovery, upgrades)
Each service shows a name, description, and price or price range
Services are stored in the backend and retrieved via query

requirements.text: Create a product catalog page for computer sales showing available computers and parts with specifications and prices
acceptanceCriteria: Display products in a grid or list layout
Each product shows image, name, key specifications, and price
Products are categorized (e.g., laptops, desktops, components)
Product data is stored and retrieved from the backend

requirements.text: Implement a service request form where customers can submit repair requests with device details and issue description
acceptanceCriteria: Form includes fields for customer name, contact information, device type, and problem description
Form validates required fields before submission
Submitted requests are stored in the backend with a unique ID and timestamp
User receives confirmation after successful submission

requirements.text: Create a backend data model to store service requests, repair services, and products for sale
acceptanceCriteria: Define stable types for ServiceRequest, RepairService, and Product
Implement CRUD operations for managing services and products
Store service requests with status tracking (pending, in-progress, completed)
Use stable variables to persist data across canister upgrades

requirements.text: Design a professional, tech-focused visual theme with a modern layout emphasizing trust and technical expertise, using a color palette of slate grays, electric greens, and crisp whites
acceptanceCriteria: Apply consistent color scheme throughout the application
Use modern, readable typography suitable for a technical service business
Create a professional layout with clear navigation and sections
Ensure visual hierarchy guides users through services, products, and contact options

requirements.text: Render generated brand images including a tech-themed logo and hero background as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated
acceptanceCriteria: Display logo in the header/navigation area
Use hero background on the landing page
Images load from frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Images are properly sized and optimized for web display

constraints: Use single-actor Motoko architecture for all backend logic
Frontend must use React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and React Query
Do not modify immutable frontend paths including useInternetIdentity hooks and main.tsx

required: Modern tech-themed logo featuring circuit board or computer chip elements in electric green and slate gray (logo.dim_200x200.png)
Professional hero background showing abstract tech patterns or workspace with computers in slate gray tones (hero-bg.dim_1920x600.png)
